replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies/issues/4243

把MineColonies这个Mod更新到最新测试版试试.
https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... es/download/2869447

如果没有用，再考虑再forge.cfg中打开removeErroringEntities选项。
位置：找到这两行：    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false
第一个false改成true。个人及不推荐该做法，可能导致不可逆性损坏。应该猜得出默认值为啥都是false了吧？

replies.author: 肆火
replies.txt_content:
打开minecraft目录下config文件夹内的forge.cfg用记事本打开
然后找到2个RemoveError选项，改成true。重启游戏在进入即可
你存档崩掉的原因是实体出错了，很好解决
